title: Increase in no of state and local govt employ

content.question: The increasing number of state and local government employees reflects which of the following about the political system in the United States?

choices.label: There has been a trend toward more liberal state governments since 1970.
The addition of new states to the union has weakened the power of the national government.
State and local governments provide many necessary public services in a federal system.
The shrinking of the national budget has led to a decrease in the number of federal employees.

content.answer: State and local governments provide many necessary public services in a federal system.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
